definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: Whatever sent the precious metals out of a country impoverished it.
sentences.chinese: 而将贵金属从一个国家运出则会使其变穷。

sentences.english: Everyone has a favorite precious metal , one we gravitate back to even if we wear something else occasionally.
sentences.chinese: 人人喜爱的贵金属之一，我们即使穿回科系东西偶尔。

sentences.english: You can order a small cross made of brass or from precious metals with precious stones.
sentences.chinese: 你可以定做一个小十字，镶嵌黄铜或贵金属与宝石。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, associated Pt family element, gold and silver all are recovered comprehensively.
sentences.chinese: 同时伴生贵金属铂族元素和金银等均得到综合回收。

sentences.english: A method to prepare perofskite metal oxide used as non-noble metal CO combustion catalyst was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研究开发了一种非贵金属CO助燃剂及其制备方法。

sentences.english: The non-noble metal catalyst for n-pentane isomerization at low temperature was prepared by acid modification.
sentences.chinese: 通过酸性改性制备正戊烷异构化低温非贵金属催化剂。

sentences.english: What is the market scenario in precious metals at this juncture?
sentences.chinese: 在这样一个节骨眼上，贵金属市场表现如何呢？

sentences.english: The bright nanometer Ag powder is one important type of the precious metal powder materials.
sentences.chinese: 纳米光亮银粉是贵金属粉体材料的重要品种之一。

sentences.english: Waste computer mainboards contain abundant precious metals and other valuable metals.
sentences.chinese: 报废电脑主板中含有大量的贵金属和贱金属元素。

sentences.english: Adjusted with reference to the market offered rate of the related metal contract.
sentences.chinese: 根据个别贵金属合约市场金商所提供息口每日结算。

sentences.english: Not surprisingly, all three have been vociferous champions of gold and other precious metals.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在黄金和其他贵金属领域他们也是佼佼者。

sentences.english: Changkeng Au-Ag deposit is a newly-discovered, large-scale and new type precious metal deposit.
sentences.chinese: 长坑金银矿是新近发现的新型大型贵金属矿床。

sentences.english: Precious metal in non-coin form such as ingots, bars or wafers.
sentences.chinese: 非硬币形状的贵金属，例如金块或金条。

sentences.english: Non-set of assorted articles of heading No. 8215, plated with precious metal.
sentences.chinese: 第8215节之各种物品，未配成套，镀贵金属者。

sentences.english: MRT can also be applied for the refining of slimes containing precious metals.
sentences.chinese: MRT也可以用于精炼含贵金属的阳极泥。

definition: non-ferrous metals (all metals excluding iron, chromium, manganese and their alloys)
abbr. for 期貨合約|期货合约[qi1 huo4 he2 yue1], futures contract (finance)
USB flash drive/see also 閃存盤|闪存盘[shan3 cun2 pan2]
